[#soil-mottle-type_result-value]
====== Result value

[frame=none, cols="1,5"]
|===
|Property | Value

|Identifier | `urn:shapes:soil-soil-pit-characterization-protocol-shapes:soil-mottle-type:result-value`
|Label | Result value
|Definition | The value of `rdf:value` _MUST_ exist in the Soils mottle types codes controlled vocabulary.
|Comment | The value in `sosa:hasResult` _MUST_ be a value in `sh:in`, which is the Soils mottle types codes controlled vocabulary.
include::../../../../statuses/submitted.adoc[]
|Conformance Classes | `TBA`

|Property | Value
|Controlled list items | The result value MUST be from the following list: 

link:https://linked.data.gov.au/def/nrm/fb005f96-ecfd-55ff-864d-f84b00706505[`Colour patterns due to biological mixing of soil material from other horizons (e.g. worm casts).`] 

link:https://linked.data.gov.au/def/nrm/72833bd4-3246-55d5-a6dd-34e5bebadcaa[`Colour patterns due to inclusions of weathered substrate material.`] 

link:https://linked.data.gov.au/def/nrm/0eaade24-2a3b-5f2a-951e-41ab3f03ef64[`Colour patterns due to mechanical mixing of soil material from other horizons (e.g. inclusions of B horizon material in Ap horizons).`] 

link:https://linked.data.gov.au/def/nrm/e7a67be7-8d1e-50ad-b717-2fa85f49a94f[`Mottles`] 


|Source | TERN Ecosystem Surveillance Ecological Monitoring Protocols
